name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Sean Alan HUFF, Respondent

pin_cites.parenthetical: reasonable suspicion is all that is required to support initial investigative detention
reasonable suspicion is all that is required to support initial investigative detention

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Sean Alan HUFF, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10 th day of March, 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, and the order of the Superior Court is REVERSED, pursuant to Commonwealth v. Ellis, 541 Pa. 285, 662 A.2d 1043, 1047 (1995) (reasonable suspicion is all that is required to support initial investigative detention). Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
844 A.2d 549
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Sean Alan HUFF, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 10, 2004.
